SELECT BBD.BankBookDetailIdx, BBD.Category1Idx, BBD.Category2Idx, BBD.Category3Idx, BBD.Amount, BBD.AmountType, BBD.AmountDate, BBD.Content,
( SELECT SUM(Amount) FROM BankBookDetail WHERE Category1Idx = BBD.Category1Idx AND BankBookIdx = (SELECT BankBookIdx FROM BankBook WHERE BankBookTypeIdx = 1) AND DATE_FORMAT(AmountDate, '%Y%m') = #{amountDateStr} GROUP BY Category1Idx ) AS TotalAmount,
( SELECT COUNT(Category1Idx) FROM BankBookDetail WHERE Category1Idx = BBD.Category1Idx AND BankBookIdx = (SELECT BankBookIdx FROM BankBook WHERE BankBookTypeIdx = 1) AND DATE_FORMAT(AmountDate, '%Y%m') = #{amountDateStr} GROUP BY Category1Idx ) AS TotalCount,
C1.CategoryIdx AS Category1Idx, C1.CategoryCode AS Category1Code, C1.CategoryName AS Category1Name,
C2.CategoryIdx AS Category2Idx, C2.CategoryCode AS Category2Code, C2.CategoryName AS Category2Name,
C3.CategoryIdx AS Category3Idx, C3.CategoryCode AS Category3Code, C3.CategoryName AS Category3Name
FROM BankBookDetail AS BBD
LEFT JOIN Category AS C1 ON C1.CategoryIdx = BBD.Category1Idx
LEFT JOIN Category AS C2 ON C2.CategoryIdx = BBD.Category2Idx
LEFT JOIN Category AS C3 ON C3.CategoryIdx = BBD.Category3Idx
WHERE BBD.BankBookIdx = (SELECT BankBookIdx FROM BankBook WHERE BankBookTypeIdx = 1)
AND BBD.HomeIdx = #{homeIdx}
AND DATE_FORMAT(BBD.AmountDate, '%Y%m') = #{amountDateStr}
ORDER BY TotalAmount DESC, BBD.AmountDate ASC, BBD.Category1Idx ASC
